fields.name: CreatedAbstractSuccessMessage
fields.fieldText:
Please add at least one author to your abstract.

Do not add more than 25 authors.

fields.name: AuthorNotFoundDisplay
fields.fieldText: ﻿If you cannot find the author in the search, please create a new author by entering the email here:

fields.name: AlreadySubmittedText
fields.fieldText:
An abstract has already been submitted for this Lecture.

Please check your abstract submissions in the community.

fields.name: NotEligibleText
fields.fieldText: Sorry, you are not eligible to submit an invited abstract.

fields.name: SubmissionClosedText
fields.fieldText: The submission window is closed. You cannot submit an abstract anymore.

fields.name: DraftSuccessText
fields.fieldText:
Your draft has been saved!

All abstracts drafts can be seen and edited in the community.

fields.name: InvitedSubmissionIntroText
fields.fieldText:
You are completing a submission for an abstract for your lecture:


{!Get_Lecture.Lecture_Title__c}


If this is not the correct lecture, please contact EAN staff.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter less than 250 words.
Please enter less than 250 words.

fields.name: AbstractSummary
fields.fieldText:
Please review your submission:

﻿


Abstract Title:

{!Title}


Body ({!WordCountBody} words):

{!Body}


Disclosure:

{!Disclosure}

fields.name: ConfirmText
fields.fieldText: Click Next to confirm and continue.

fields.name: NoFilesAddedText
fields.fieldText:
You have not added any images to your abstract.

Click Previous to add images.

Click Next to continue. You can also add images later.

fields.name: SuccessTextFiles
fields.fieldText: Following files have been added to your abstract:

value.stringValue: Do you want to submit this abstract now?
Yes, I want to submit my abstract now
No, I want to save this draft and submit it later

fields.name: SubmitSuccessTxt
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your abstract submission!

You can see the status of your submitted abstract in the community.

fields.name: AbstractCreatesSuccessText
fields.fieldText:
A draft of your abstract has been successfully created!

If you need to make changes to your abstract, you can do this later as well.


Now, please add files and captions to your abstract.

fields.name: ConfirmText2
fields.fieldText: Click Next to see which files you have uploaded.
